name: Tarot
text: This is a long-term project I started this year. It aims at showcasing some philosophical essays of mine about the Tarot de Marseilles.
text2: This React project uses lots of techniques I learned with Open Classrooms. The structure of the project is complete but the 78 meditations about the Tarot Arcana could take a lifelong to elaborate.

name: kasa
text: This has ben created as part of the Open Classrooms 9 months web developer training program. It emphases React structure and css/sass.

name: paintings
text: This is a personal project I made in order to avertise my acrylics on canvas and other drawings
text2: It was made when CSS2 was still uncharted territory and it features lots of experimentations with interactive animations.
